description: Try our easy to follow Peach & Brown Sugar Muffins recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Peach & Brown Sugar Muffins Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 ripe peaches, stoned, each cut into 8 wedges and halved horizontally

recipeInstructions.text: Line a 12-hole muffin tin with paper muffin cases.
Place the flour, sugar and mixed spice in a bowl. Chop 20 of the peach pieces and add to the bowl.
Mix together the yoghurt, milk and egg in jug and add to the dry ingredients. Lightly stir until just combined - don't overmix.

Spoon the mixture into the paper cases and push the remaining half-wedges of peach into the mixture. Sprinkle over a little sugar and bake in a preheated oven, 190°C for 15-20 minutes until well risen and golden. Remove to a wire rack and dust with icing sugar, before serving.
